Title: Oyo to deploy 2,000 security operatives for Ladoja’s coronation
Summary: Oyo State government to deploy 2,000 security operatives to ensure a hitch-free coronation of Oba Rashidi Ladoja as the 44th Olubadan of Ibadanland . Chairman of the Coronation Planning Committee and former President General of the Central Nigeria’s Central Bank of Nigeria .

Title: Chapter 1: Made Kuti’s Soul-searching Afrobeat
Summary: Made Kuti is charting his own path with his new album Chapter 1: Where Does Happiness Come From? He opens a new chapter of Afrobeat that is rooted in African music .

Title: FG unveils 15-year livestock transformation plan to boost food security
Summary: FG unveils 15-year livestock transformation plan to boost food security . The plan is designed to transform Nigeria’s livestock sector into a key driver of food security, job creation, and rural prosperity . Developed in collaboration with the International Livestock Organisation .

Title: NACAT demands release of detained journalist
Summary: The Network Against Corruption and Anti-Drug Trafficking (NACAT) has called for the immediate and unconditional release of journalist Fejiro Oliver . Oliver was arrested and detained by operatives of the Nigerian Police Force .

Title: Navy deploys gunboats in Rivers creeks
Summary: The Nigerian Navy has reassured residents of Rivers State of their safety . Its personnel are physically fit, strategically deployed, and fully equipped to tackle criminal activities across the state’s waterways and creeks . Speaking during the Third Quarter Route, the Navy said its personnel were physically fit and strategically deployed .

Title: Transmission tower collapse disrupts power supply to Kaduna South
Summary: The TCN apologized to affected customers, assuring them that it is working round the clock to restore supply . TCN said it was working round-the-clock to restore power supply .

Title: N761bn Abuja-Kaduna-Kano Road: FG insists on June 2026 deadline
Summary: The Minister of Works, David Umahi, directed contractors handling various sections of the N761 billion Abuja-Kaduna-Kano Road to stick to agreed timelines . He also said that henceforth, the ministry would insist on milestone completion and not rely on certificates for payment .

Title: Sokoto: Scores feared dead in Sabon Birni boat mishap
Summary: Police disclosed that search and rescue operations are ongoing to recover the bodies of victims still missing . Search and rescue efforts are ongoing, the Police disclosed .

Title: Scores fleeing Lakurawa terrorists drown in Sokoto boat accident
Summary: Scores fleeing Lakurawa terrorists drown in Sokoto boat accident . The exact number of passengers aboard the ill-fated boat was yet to be ascertained .

Title: Troops nab 2 suspected kidnappers in Taraba
Summary: Troops nab 2 suspected kidnappers in Taraba State . The Army said in a statement that the arrest is in continuation of ongoing clearance operations .
